item.title: Borderlands 4: Best Harlowe Build (Chroma Accelerator)
item.description:
Harlowe has quickly become one of the most powerful and fun Vault Hunters in Borderlands 4 , and her Chroma Accelerator action skill is proof of that. With an endgame build, players are going to ensure every enemy within Harlowe's line of sight (and beyond) is annihilated in a nuclear explosion, and any of them that manage to survive will be quickly wiped out with rapid fire. Players can find the best Chroma Accelerator Harlowe build in Borderlands 4 right here , and this Harlowe One-Shot build will make it so that you can kill bosses in UHV5 within seconds, and sometimes, even quicker.

This build does NOT need a Throwing Knife with Penetrator Augment to be effective.

Best Skills for Chroma Accelerator Harlowe

Skill

Description

Why It's Useful

Cyclotron (5/5)

Harlowe gains increased Fire Rate.

More Fire Rate means Harlowe's going to tear through enemies so much faster.

Neutron Capture (Augment)

All Damage Harlowe's Unstable Energy Pocket deals to enemies is stored. Whenever it explodes, a portion of that Stored Damage is transferred to Harlowe's Gun, causing her to deal Bonus Radiation Damage.

Use Action Skill to gain absurdly high damage for 8 seconds.

Fuzzy Math (5/5)

Harlowe gains increased Status Effect Chance.

More Status Effects, more damage!

Field-Ready Prototype (5/5)

Harlowe gains increased Action Skill Damage.

Turn Harlowe's Action Skill into a nuke with more damage.

Poisoned Sun (5/5)

Harlowe gains increased Radiation Damage and Irradiation Chance.

Really helps the Action Skill to Irradiate and melt enemies.

Chain Reactor (3/3)

Harlowe deals Bonus Radiation Damage to Entangled enemies.

Radiation Damage is already buffed, and Entangled enemies are those affected by her Action Skill.

Fissile Launcher (2/3)

Whenever Harlowe damages an Irradiated enemy or an Entangled enemy, shoot a Radiation Dart at another enemy.

Helps with ad-control.

Demon Core (Capstone)

As Harlowe's Unstable Energy Pocket travels, it shoots Radiation Darts at enemies. Whenever Harlowe Entangles an enemy while her Action Skill is active, automatically Irradiate that enemy.

The real kicker from this is to irradiate enemies with the Action Skill to make them weaker.

Mechanical Brilliance (5/5)

Whenever Harlowe damages an enemy with a Skill, she gains increased Skill Damage. This effect stacks.

Use Action Skill, deal more damage. Simple!

Practical Applications (5/5)

Harlowe gains increased Skill Damage.

Further increase the nuclear power of Harlowe's Action Skill.

Make Extraordinary (5/5)

Harlowe gains Critical Hit Chance with all Skills. This chance increases every time Harlowe Entangles an enemy. This effect stacks.

Use your Action Skill to see an absurdly high Critical Hit Chance for 8 seconds.

Periodic Table Flip (4/5)

Harlowe gains increased Elemental Damage, Status Effect Application Chance, and Cryo Effectiveness.

More Elemental Damage and Status Effect Chance helps to irradiate.

Bright Future (4/5)

Whenever Harlowe triggers or retriggers an Action Skill, she gains increased Fire Rate.

Even more Fire Rate upon Action Skill use.

Ripple Effect (1/1)

Kill Skill. Whenever Harlowe kills an Entangled enemy, automatically Entangle another nearby enemy.

A chain reaction of squishy enemies getting killed.

This build is very simple to use, and here's what you need to do when facing a boss:

  • Use the War Paint Repkit
  • Pop your Action Skill
  • Fire your Vladof Assault Rifle

That's the basics, and that's what makes this build so good. With these aspects, players are going to see Harlowe's Action Skill fire at enemies and detonate, which then absolutely annihilates the boss, making them extremely weak to damage and increasing your Fire Rate. As soon as you've used your Action Skill, your rapid-fire Vladof Assault Rifle will wipe them out, and you don't even need a Penetrator Augment Knife for this. However, if you do have one, use it before the War Paint Repkit.

Best Weapons and Gear for Chroma Accelerator Harlowe

Only 2 things really matter for this build, as everything else can be used by what you feel the most comfortable with. However, we'll list everything we use and where you can farm them so that you can fully optimize the build.

Firstly, there are the weapons. We used either of these Assault Rifles: Lucian's Flank (Meathead Riders, Old Scrape Ripper Drill Site, Cuspid Climb, Terminus Range) OR Aegon's Dream (Horace, Horace's Oversight, Hungering Plain, Fadefields). Really, the main reason to use these Assault Rifles is because they're Vladof with the Extra Barrel Alt-Fire, which comes with an absurdly high fire rate. Both are good options, as Lucian's Flank returns ammo on Critical Hits and Aegon's Dream provides Incendiary and Cryo damage. A high Rate of Fire Assault Rifle is essential for melting bosses.

To further increase Fire Rate, you'll want to use the Shiny War Paint Repkit (Meathead Riders, Old Scrape Ripper Drill Site, Cuspid Climb, Terminus Range). This Repkit has decent healing, but the main use from this comes from how it increases Fire Rate and Movement Speed. Another aspect of increasing Fire Rate and Damage comes from Enhancements. Players are going to want to use any Enhancement that focuses on Vladof-licensed parts , like Box Magazine to increase Fire Rate and Magazine Size, or Bullet Hose to provide a Chance to add an extra Projectile per shot.

For the Class Mod, use anything that increases Skill Damage, but we went for the Skeptic Class Mod (Callis, the Ripper Queen, Moon-Called Throne, Fallen Crown, Carcadia Burn), not for the skill bonuses, but for the fact that shootign enemies with an active Status Effect restores Action Skill, making it so you just have to shoot enemies to get your abilities back.

The Shield doesn't really matter, but we went with Firewerks (Splashzone, Riptide Grotto, Coastal Bonescape, Fadefields) because being able to see automatic Missiles shoot enemies when killed just really helps ad-control, but anything works. Lastly, Ordnance really does not matter as you won't be using it, but if you want to make this build go off the rails, use a Throwing Knife with Damage Amp Payload and Penetrator Augment for Critical Hits and to increase Damage Taken against the enemy, but again, this really is just overkill, and you don't have to use it.

Best Specializations for Chroma Accelerator Harlowe

Specialization Perk

Description

Now With Caffeine

Reduce Action Skill Cooldown whenever a Repkit is activated.

Action Skill Cooldown Reduction: 25%

I Am A Gun

Action Skill Damage now benefits from increases to Gun Damage.

Action Skill Damage: 50% of increases to Gun Damage

A Honed Mind

Action Skills gain a chance to Critically Hit enemies, and also gain increased Action Skill Critical Hit Damage.

Action Skill Critical Hit Chance: 5%

Action Skill Critical Hit Damage: +50%

Riddle You This

Whenever the Vault Hunter deals Gun Damage, gain a Stack of Riddle You This, increasing Gun Damage.

Stacks are lost if a new Stack has not been gained for 6 seconds.

Gun Damage: +1% per Stack

Maximum Stacks: 50

For Harlowe's Specializations, you're going to want to focus on 10 Points in Sharpshooter and 10 Points in Runner, specifically so that you can unlock Daredevil. With Daredevil unlocked, bump it to 20 for the increased Action Skill Cooldown Rate and all 3 skills within this tree. If you have any left over points, place 20 into Brute and at least 20 more in Survivor, then use your remaining Points to continue investing into Daredevil.

Best Firmware for Chroma Accelerator Harlowe

Firmware

Bonuses

Slots

Bullets To Spare

Gun Fire Rate is increased by +5%

Gun Magazine Size is increased by +20%

Gun Fire Rate is increased by 50% of Gun Magazine Size

3

GOOFJC

Action Skill Cooldown Rate is increased by +10%

Action Skill Damage is increased by +15%

2

Harlowe's build is extremely dependent on her Fire Rate and her Action Skill. As such, we decided to use 3 pieces of equipment with Bullets To Spare so that we can increase the Fire Rate by +55%, along with a +20% increase to Gun Magazine Size. This build is so optimal, you won't even need these extra stats, but they're there for overkill. Bring along 2 pieces of gear with GOOFJC so you can increase your Action Skill Cooldown Rate by +10%, and your Action Skill Damage by +15% to really pump out an unstoppable nuke.

16
7.3 /10
8 /10

Borderlands 4

item.title: Lara Croft, Nathan Drake, And 6 Other Great Tomb Raiders
item.description:
Raiders of the Lost Ark was the first film in the Indiana Jones franchise, and it blew moviegoers away in 1981. Kids who grew up in the 80s easily recognized the theme song and loved to hum it, no matter if they were riding their bikes, walking down the street, or diving into a pillow fort.

The idea of archeology being a cool profession was rejuvenated, and some kids of this era became successful developers who paid homage to Indiana Jones with their own tomb-raiding adventures. Let’s go through video game characters who have surpassed Indiana Jones in tomb raiding and recommend some good games as well.

Lara Croft (Tomb Raider)

Gaming’s First Crush

Tomb Raider
8.5 /10
Released
November 14, 1996

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Animated Blood, Violence
Powered by

Lara Croft is the star of the Tomb Raider franchise, debuting in 1996. While Lara has had her ups and downs across several reboots, the last trilogy showed Lara at her best. A spunkier, younger version who was learning the ropes and wasn’t afraid to get messy, be it in a cavern full of dead bodies or a forest full of menacing raiders. The latter trilogy had fewer tombs to explore, but the classics were full of them, from tombs in windswept deserts to underwater catacombs. That’s what Lara does best, variety, as she is equipped for any exploration mission.

Nathan Drake (Uncharted)

Dude Raider

Uncharted: Drake's Fortune
8.8 /10
Released
November 19, 2007

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Blood, Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Use of Tobacco, Violence
Powered by

Nathan Drake, affectionately nicknamed “Dude Raider,” was like the male spiritual successor to Lara Croft. His first adventure was Uncharted: Drake’s Fortune in 2007, which kick-started a new era for the developer, Naughty Dog. What sets Nathan apart from other tomb raiders is that he’s also a thief and a sly one at that. He’s not in it to preserve history, although he is fascinated by the locations he visits. Instead, Nathan wants to make money and a name for himself come hell or high water. His quick wit, resilient body, and rotating pack of thieves help Nathan stand out.

Mega Man Trigger/Volnutt (Mega Man Legends)

Halcyon Days

Mega Man Legends
Action-Adventure
Systems
10 /10
Released
August 31, 1998
ESRB
e // Animated Violence

Powered by

Mega Man Trigger may not spring to mind for a lot of game fans, and that’s understandable because he’s a bit more forgotten. The protagonist of the two Mega Man Legends games on PS1, this series takes place in the far future, after the collapse of the futuristic settings of the X series.

Society now lives on small islands and thrives on Refractor Crystals found in tombs hidden across the world. The opening mission to the first game is like an homage to Raiders of the Lost Ark . While Trigger, or Volnutt as he is also called, sees more action than puzzles in his tombs, he’s a skill raider regardless.

Wario (Wario Land)

Coins Fuel Him

Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3
Action
Platformer
Systems
Released
March 13, 1994

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
E // Mild Fantasy Violence
Powered by

Nintendo fans don’t need much of an introduction to one of the greatest antagonists of the Mario series, Wario. He first appeared in a playable role in Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3 . As the Wario series went on, there was a bigger emphasis on loot, with Wario Land 4 being the peak period of Wario’s tomb raiding career in the GBA. He got plenty of coins in Wario Land: Shake It!, but it was less about tomb raiding and more about pirate raiding. Overall, as boisterous as he is, Wario is quite the capable explorer when he chooses to be.

Guy Spelunky (Spelunky)

A Brutal Roguelike

Spelunky
6 /10
8.5 /10
Released
October 21, 2008

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Fantasy Violence, Blood, Mild Suggestive Themes
Powered by

Guy is the hero of Spelunky , one of the most challenging roguelikes of all time. It’s no mistake that he was designed to look like Indiana Jones, except more cartoony, as he does have a trusty brown hat and whip. This whip is how he deals with most foes as he explores the Aztec-like ruins in the first game. In the sequel, he goes missing within some moon ruins, and his daughter has to rescue him. While devoid of a personality since this is a small indie game, Guy is still an iconic tomb raider.

Scrooge McDuck (DuckTales)

Life Is Like An Aeroplane

DuckTales
7.0 /10
Released
September 14, 1989

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
E
Powered by

Those who grew up in the 80s know Scrooge McDuck all too well, or as his nephews called him in the cartoon DuckTales , Uncle Scrooge. Scrooge was a penny-pincher, but one who had amassed a small fortune thanks to his dungeon diving, showcased in every episode. Capcom developed two games for the NES based on DuckTales , each featuring a new tomb-raiding adventure that spanned from the jungle to the moon.

While he didn’t do any adventuring in Kingdom Hearts 3 , that was probably Scrooge’s last game appearance outside of the cartoons. As old as he may appear, Scrooge is a legendary explorer who could whack any of these other adventurers with his trusty bouncy cane

Shantae (Shantae)

A Half-Genie Hero Who Also Enjoys Adventure

Shantae
Platformer
Systems
Released
June 13, 2002

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
E For Everyone: Mild Violence
Powered by

Shantae first appeared in the Game Boy Color game of the same name. She’s a Half-Genie, meaning that she appears as a human, but she can learn some magic. She doesn’t wield a whip, but her main weapon is her hair, which she can use like a whip. Most games are littered with ruins, which will grant Shantae various new dances. For example, in the newest game, Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution , she can turn into a crab or monkey. Typically, she only goes into ruins to stop villains from destroying them, but as she dives deep and still gathers treasure, Shantae definitely fits into this group of adventurers.

Lemeza Kosugi (La-Mulana)

Another Indiana Lookalike Winner

La-Mulana
Action
Adventure
Indie
Systems
Released
June 27, 2005

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
E 10+ // Animated Blood, Mild Fantasy Violence, Suggestive Themes
Powered by

Lemeza is from La-Mulana , another Metroidvania, and another character that was modeled after Indians Jones. La-Mulana is one of the hardest Metroidvanias around since the controls have to be very precise and there’s a lot of backtracking. From whipping enemies to avoiding traps, there’s a lot to be aware of. That’s what makes Lemeza canonically resilient, though, as he’s able to get through the sprawling ruins of the first game on his own. The sequel stars his daughter, which is another way La-Mulana and Spelunky are connected.

item.title: Roblox: Slime Incremental Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Slime Incremental offers players an exciting incremental experience. Your main task is to collect various slimes. In exchange for them, you can purchase upgrades and speed up your progress. But at first, you will be quite slow in earning money and EXP. Luckily, Slime Incremental codes will help you fix this.

These Roblox codes contain various goodies from the developers, such as boosters, potions, and currencies. However, after some time after the release, each of the codes expires, so you will not want to delay using them.

Updated September 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Slime Incremental offers a variety of rewards through its active codes, giving you useful boosts and potions to help with progression. From experience multipliers to extra potions, these bonuses make it easier to grow stronger and advance faster. Some provide time-limited boosts, while others supply rare potions that give an edge in gameplay. Keep an eye out for more updates, as additional rewards are released over time.

All Slime Incremental Codes

Working Slime Incremental Codes

  • SORRY - Redeem this code to get x2 Rainbow Potion (NEW)
  • Delayed - Redeem this code to get x2 Slimes Boost and 30 min of x2 EXP Boost (NEW)
  • MangoMango - Redeem this code to get x2 Rainbow Potion (NEW)
  • FirstUpdate - Redeem this code to get x2 Amulet Luck Potion (NEW)
  • OneHundredKVisits - Redeem this code x2 Exp Boost for 30min and 4 Energy Potions
  • TenKVisits - Redeem this code x2 Slimes Boost for 30min and 2 Godly Potions

Expired Slime Incremental Codes

  • SIRY - Redeem this code to get Rainbow Potion
  • Cheeseburger - Redeem this code to get 10 SP
  • ReleaseYippe - Redeem this code to get x2 EXP Boost for 30min and x2 Slime Value Boost for 30min
  • SillyAmulets - Redeem this code for a Rainbow Potion

The main currency in Slime Incremental is the slimes that you must collect around the field. At first, no more than 5 of them spawn at a time. But by investing in upgrades, you can increase this number. In addition, players can upgrade the spawn rate of rarer slimes, money, and EXP multipliers, and much more. However, at the beginning, you will not have multipliers, so buying the first upgrades takes quite a long time. If you want to speed up this process, then Slime Incremental codes are what you need.

Codes grant players various rewards. Most of them offer you temporary boosters and Potions. It is important to note that the latter you can use whenever you want, while the former are activated immediately. And you will want to hurry, as they expire quickly.

How to Redeem Slime Incremental Codes

Using Slime Incremental codes is no different from most other similar Roblox experiences. All you need to do is make a few clicks to get free goodies from the developers. And for convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • First, launch Slime Incremental codes.
  • Next, click on the gear icon on the right side of the screen to open Settings.
  • After that, scroll down and then enter the code in the appropriate field.
  • Finally, click on the green checkmark to claim the reward.

How to Get More Slime Incremental Codes

In order not to miss new Slime Incremental codes, you need to bookmark this guide, as we will update it over time, like our other Roblox codes articles. Also, you can check the official developers' pages:

  • Void Squad Discord server
  • Void Squad Roblox group
Roblox

8.8 /10

item.title: Roblox: Savannah Life Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Savannah Life is a well-made RPG with great graphics, mechanics, and a concept that you don't often find in other Roblox games. Here, you will have to survive as an animal, predator, or herbivore in a huge savannah filled with dangers and other players who can also pose a threat.

To dominate this world, you need to climb the evolutionary ladder from herbivore to predator as quickly as possible, but first you need a lot of currency, which is not easy to get. Luckily, you can redeem Savannah Life codes that will bring you a bunch of freebies, including currency that you can spend on the desired upgrades.

Updated September 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Savannah Life has a few active codes that provide you with extra coins to spend in-game. These rewards can give you a helpful boost, whether you are just starting out or looking to progress further. The available codes offer different amounts of coins, so you have multiple ways to grow your balance. Make sure to keep an eye out for future updates so you can grab more rewards when they drop.

All Savannah Life Codes

Working Savannah Life Codes

  • HYENA - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins. (NEW)
  • BACON_AND_EGGS - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.
  • FAST_CAT - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.
  • MONKEY - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.

Expired Savannah Life Codes

  • THE_KING - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins.
  • CROCODILE - Redeem this code to get 325 Coins.
  • I_BELIEVE_I_CAN_FLY - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins.
  • CLIMBING_CAT - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.
  • RHINO - Redeem this code to get 350 Coins.
  • LONG_NECK - Redeem this code to get 450 Coins.
  • CUTE_DOG - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins.
  • FREE_PRESENT - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.
  • MOO_DENG - Redeem this code to get 400 Coins.
  • MUFASA - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.

As mentioned above, redeeming Savannah Life codes will bring you a bunch of useful things that will greatly help you progress in the game, especially if you are a beginner. It's worth noting that each of them has a certain expiration date, so if you don't want to miss out on rewards, redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Codes for Savannah Life

Redeeming Savannah Life codes will not be difficult for you, especially if you have done it before in other Roblox games. But if you're a beginner or don't understand how the Savannah Life redemption system works, here's a step-by-step guide to help you with that:

  • Launch Savannah Life .
  • In the main menu, you will see a list of buttons and options. Among them, interact with the last one which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field where you will need to enter one of the working codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, hit the Enter key to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Savannah Life Codes

To find more Savannah Life codes, all you need to do is visit the game's official social media. Here, along with other content, developers often share Roblox codes, so be careful not to miss them.

  • Official Savannah Life Roblox group.
  • Official Savannah Life Discord server.
  • Official Savannah Life YouTube channel.
Roblox

item.title: Warframe Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • Warframe Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Warframe
  • Warframe Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe
  • About the Warframe Developers

Warframe is a free-to-play sci-fi action game. It actually feels like the developers worked really hard on the game, as they have thought of many features, including customization items. Below are plenty of Warframe codes for freebies as Glyphs skins and others.

Updated September 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Warframe offers a variety of codes that let you unlock different in-game rewards, including cosmetics and exclusive glyphs. Alongside the special decoration code, you can redeem several active glyph codes to personalize your profile. These options give you a chance to show off unique designs while expanding your collection. Keep checking back here for future codes that may bring even more customization and rewards.

Warframe Codes

Below, fans will find all the codes for Warframe, including a lot of Glyph codes. In the game, Glyphs are special images that players can use to personalize their profile or to distribute in the game. Glyphs can be placed on certain surfaces in the game, such as the walls of a player's base, or used as a profile picture.

Codes Checked on September 20, 2025.

How to Redeem Codes in Warframe

The process of redeeming codes is not as easy as one would expect since it is different from most other games. Therefore, if players have any difficulties, the step-by-step instructions below will help them:

  • First, visit the official promo code page on the Warframe website.
  • Then, players need to log in to their Warframe account.
  • Afterward, they should enter or copy the above-mentioned code in the Promo Code field.
  • To redeem the code, click the Submit Code button.

Warframe Tips and Tricks

  • Platinum Strategy: Invest the initial 50 platinum wisely, focusing on weapon and Warframe slots for efficient gear management.
  • Mastery Rank: Increase Mastery Rank by leveling gear and completing Mastery Tests.
  • Star Chart Priority: Systematically conquer Star Chart missions before venturing into open-world areas for better rewards later on.
  • Trading Tactics: Engage in trading when a platinum discount is available, and rely on Warframe Market for fair transactions, avoiding trade chat as a beginner.
  • Nightwave Rewards: Participate in Nightwave challenges for valuable items and rank advancement.
  • Syndicate Support: Join syndicates for passive reputation gains and rewards.
  • Endo Management: Spend Endo wisely, choosing essential mods over others.
  • Premium Assistance: Consider premium boosts for faster progression, especially if time is limited.

About the Warframe Developers

Warframe was created by the developers from Digital Extremes. This Canadian team has been making games since 1993 and has more than 200 workers. Here are some of their titles:

  • Unreal Tournament
  • Epic Pinball
  • Dark Sector
  • The Darkness II
  • Soulframe
